name: Unstable Platform
description:
For Best Experience Play On Google Chrome

This Is My First Game Jam I Think I Did A Good Job

If You Get Hit 3 Times By The Enemies Bullets You Die I Didn't Have Enough Time To Add A Heath Bar

What Is This Game

It Is A Platformer were Platforms Brake When Stand On For To Long. You Need To Fight Enemies While Also Trying Not To Get Hit By The Enemies Bullets. It Is A Fun And A Challenging Game And Short So You Can Finish It

Controls

[A]/[D] To Move

[Space] To Jump

[Left Mouse Button] To Shoot

[R] To Restart

I Am Very Happy With This Game And Hope You Like It Some Of The Work Was Done Live On Twitch https://www.twitch.tv/mysticgaming306 

Enjoy :)
